abstract: Glenn Kenny reviews Aaron Brookner documentary film Uncle Howard, about personal life of filmmaker Howard Brookner.

headline.print_headline: Looking Back at the Arc of a Filmmaker’s Career
headline.main: Review: ‘Uncle Howard’ Looks Back at a Filmmaker’s Work Cut Short

snippet: This documentary is a dual portrait of intertwined artists: Howard Brookner, who died of AIDS early in his career, and his nephew Aaron Brookner, now also a filmmaker....
lead_paragraph: This documentary is a dual portrait of intertwined artists: Howard Brookner, who died of AIDS early in his career, and his nephew Aaron Brookner, now also a filmmaker.
